copy.description: Choose from stunning FAQ designs that turn heads and convert visitors.
copy.title: FAQ templates - Clickeen

copy.headline: Your FAQ. Your way.
copy.subheadline: Beautiful by default. Unmistakably yours by design.

copy.headline: Bold when you need it
copy.subheadline: Glassmorphism, liquid glass, neumorphism—trend-forward looks in light and dark.

copy.headline: Elegant when you want it
copy.subheadline: Minimal, clean, and modern. Timeless styles that always feel current.

copy.headline: Start with a design. Then make it yours.
copy.body: Get the aesthetic instantly. Trending designs or evergreen classics. Then customize without limits—per-corner radius, per-side shadows, per-role typography, and responsive breakpoints. A template that becomes your signature.

copy.title: Design freedom, built in.
copy.subhead: From layouts to finishes to fonts—customization that feels effortless.

items.title: Layouts, your way
items.body: Many layout systems, not one. Per-breakpoint structure. Independent desktop/mobile padding and spacing. Control columns, stacking, alignment, and reflow—exactly.

items.title: Appearance control without limits
items.body: Per-corner radius. Borders with custom colors. Shadows outside and inside (linked or independent per-side). Gradient, image, or video backgrounds. Total visual authority.

items.title: Typography precision
items.body: Six distinct roles (headline, body, question, answer, button, section). Choose from 17 Google Fonts. Weight, style, size—all customizable per role. Dynamic scales.

copy.headline: Three layout engines for your FAQ widget
copy.subheadline: Accordion for progressive reveal. List for simplicity. Cards for visual hierarchy. Grid or masonry. Responsive columns. Granular control over gaps and padding.

copy.headline: Appearance control without limits
copy.subheadline: Per-corner radius. Borders with custom colors. Shadows outside and inside (linked or independent per-side). Gradient, image, or video backgrounds. Total visual authority.

copy.headline: Typography precision
copy.subheadline: Six distinct roles (headline, body, question, answer, button, section). Choose from 17 Google Fonts. Weight, style, size—all customizable per role. Dynamic scales.

copy.headline: Dark mode: sophisticated and modern
copy.subheadline: Modern interfaces thrive in darkness. Premium feel with cutting-edge aesthetics. Included with every template.

copy.headline: Desktop and mobile, perfectly tuned
copy.subheadline: Your FAQ widget responds to every breakpoint. Different column counts, padding, spacing per device. One design language, infinite viewports.

copy.title: From template to perfect fit
copy.subhead: How to build your FAQ widget

items.title: Choose a design template
items.body: Trending, classic, or minimal. Light and dark modes.

items.title: Customize layouts and appearance
items.body: Accordion, list, or cards. Per-corner radius, per-side shadows, gradients, borders.

items.title: Refine typography and responsiveness
items.body: Six font roles, 17 Google Fonts. Perfect on desktop and mobile.

copy.headline: Create a free FAQ widget
copy.subheadline: Start with a design template or build from scratch. Total creative control.
